entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and after midnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:41 PM CDT Friday 28 April 2023
